text: hananim-eun geudeul gagjaui joeag-e ttala beolhayeoss-euni geudeul jung-eneun dol pogpung-ulo beol-eul bad-eun baegseong-i issgo keun byeolag-eul maj-eun baegseongdo iss eumyeo ttohan hananim-eun daejilo hayeo geum geudeul-eul samkyeobeolidolog hayeossgo tto mul-e igsahagedo hayeossnola i geos-eun god hananim seuseuloga geudeul-eul yogdoege han geos-i anila geudeul-i seuseuloleul yogdoege han geos ppun-ila
